comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Guido Ciccolini,(1882-1963), an Italian tenor involved in a divorce scandal (as a witness) in 1917. He was also supposed to be on the Titanic, but changed his travel plans at the last minute. www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?GRid=7619534&page=gr Hear him here: youtu.be/einAgLLbtSE

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: This photo is probably from the Albertina "Baby" Marlow theft trial in March-April, 1915, as he was a witness to some of the events giving rise to that case: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9B0CE7D8133EE7... He is pictured in this news article about the case: chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030214/1915-04-03/ed-... see also:

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
pennylrichardsca and artolog:

Thank you for providing such rich sources of information on Mr. Ciccolini and the case in which he was a witness. We can add information to all related records when we update.
